modShortDescription: Multiple class options to select from when you start the game. From a hunter to a Mechanic to a assassin, your class options are all here.
modDescription:
Multiple class options to select from when you [start](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-starting-items/) the game. From a hunter to a Mechanic to a assassin, your class options are all here.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Fixed: Rifleman starter class now receives rifle as required in quest.
* Updated to remove the extra rubbish.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/Valmar-Modlets/tree/master/Valmars%20Starter%20Class%20System)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20079-valmars-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Valmar](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/valmar/), [Stallionsden](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stallionsden/)
